name: Server-Side Serializer Plugin
description: This is a external store synchronizer, it posts topics via some streaming tool.

configStructure.name: schematicVersion
configStructure.description: Specify the type and version to be used.

configStructure.name: syntacticVersion
configStructure.description: Specify the type and version to be used for output.

configStructure.name: deliveryMode
configStructure.description: Specify the manner of delivery for the serialization

configStructure.name: deliveryUrl
configStructure.displayName: Host IP address or name: for delivery modes that require one.
configStructure.regexMessage: Name can only contain latin characters, digits, dot, hyphen and underscore!
configStructure.description: What is the ip address or name of the host for the graph database mega-model.

configStructure.name: topic
configStructure.displayName: topic name: for delivery modes that require one.
configStructure.description: the name of the topic, will produce a file or message of the specified topic.
